text: Rafael Alexandre de Sousa Gancho de Brito (born 19 January 2002) is a Portuguese professional footballer who plays for Benfica B in Liga Portugal 2 as a midfielder. ==Football career== Born in Lisbon, Brito made his professional debut with Benfica B in a 2–1 win over Estoril Praia in LigaPro on 11 August 2019. ==Honours== Benfica * UEFA Youth League runner-up: 2019–20 ==References== ==External links== * * *National team data Category:2002 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Lisbon Category:Portuguese footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:S.L. Benfica B players Category:LigaPro players Category:Portugal youth international footballers
title: Rafael Brito
